title: History of the American West, Southwest Borderlands, and California
description: Historiographical and chronological survey since European contact. Emphasis on the frontier and borderlands concepts, Native America, the Hispanic Southwest, US expansion and conquest, industrial capitalism, inter-societal and transnational economies, immigration, public memory, and racial identity formation. 3 lectures and a research project.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area D5 or HIST 303 (may be taken concurrently)
